quest.name: The Perfect Woman
journal: An ijin merchant in Kugane seeks help in his search for a certain enchanting someone.
objectives: Search for a person affiliated with the Mujikoza theater.
Search for a Mujikoza theater actor.
Speak with the ijin merchant once more.

dialogue.name: TRADER02812
dialogue.text: Well met, adventurer. I am newly come to this Kugane, and find myself lacking a capable womanman such as yourself to aid me in my endeavors. Would you care to hear what I propose?

dialogue.name: TRADER02812
dialogue.text: The theatrical arts of Kugane are known far and wide. If you have not had chance to take in a show, I highly suggest you do. I myself have been utterly captivated since I first witnessed a performance.

dialogue.name: TRADER02812
dialogue.text: Ever since then, I've visited the Mujikoza theater daily. Alas, I fear the business that brings me to Kugane is nearly at an end, and I shall depart these islands soon. Before I do, however, there is one person whom I should very much like to meet.

dialogue.name: TRADER02812
dialogue.text: She is an actress who played the part of a princess in a play I recently saw. And I can say beyond the shadow of a doubt that she is the most enchanting and gorgeous thing ever beheld─in this world or any other!

dialogue.name: TRADER02812
dialogue.text: I have passed my days here in longing to meet her. I have waited outside the theater. I have sought to gain insight into where she might be and when. I have done all I can, yet still the gods have not seen fit to send her to me.

dialogue.name: TRADER02812
dialogue.text: Please, deliver me from this suffering. Could you find someone, anyone, who bears some affiliation with the Mujikoza theater? I have learned they sometimes frequent the Shiokaze Hostelry after their shows. You must help me to learn anything I can of this enchantress of the stage!

dialogue.name: TRADER02812
dialogue.text: Please, deliver me from this suffering. Could you find someone, anyone, who bears some affiliation with the Mujikoza theater? I have learned they sometimes frequent the Shiokaze Hostelry after their shows. You must help me to learn anything I can of this enchantress of the stage!

dialogue.name: GIANTACTOR02812
dialogue.text: Yes? What do you want of me?

dialogue.name: GIANTACTOR02812
dialogue.text: The most beautiful woman in all of Kugane? Ahahaha! Listen, friend. It may not be my place to tell you this, but all we show on the stage at the Mujikoza is just that─show. It is fancy and fabrication, meant to appear as a dream. None of us truly look as we do in character.

dialogue.name: GIANTACTOR02812
dialogue.text: Believe me, there is no good to come of your friend finding the woman whom he lusts for. But I am merely a man, just like him. I, too, know how he feels. I know what he feels, and I know where he feels it. For even I am lost in the smell of the sweetly scented perfume. That─

dialogue.name: GIANTACTOR02812
dialogue.text: Oh, forgive me. That is the wine talking. Come, we're all adultsgrown men here, and I am too far in my cups. Let us forget such things were spoken.

dialogue.name: GIANTACTOR02812
dialogue.text: Oh, forgive me. That is the wine talking. Come, we're all adultsgrown men here, and I am too far in my cups. Let us forget such things were spoken.

dialogue.name: TRADER02812
dialogue.text: <sigh> I have learned that the last of the day's shows just ended. I watched a slew of actors and actresses leave through the door there, but I saw none who resembled the goddess that I seek.

dialogue.name: TRADER02812
dialogue.text: A sweetly scented perfume? Yes... Yes, I smelled such a fragrance from my seat in the audience! Those who left split into two groups. Let us split as well, and let the hunt for my infatuation continue!

dialogue.name: TRADER02812
dialogue.text: There were three who set off in the direction of Kogane Dori. You track them. I will track those who headed for the Rakuza District.

dialogue.name: TRADER02812
dialogue.text: When you do find them, look to their necks. They were covered in white cosmetics for the show. No doubt they have removed it since, but a bit of white powder must surely remain.

dialogue.name: TRADER02812
dialogue.text: It would seem my waiting outside the theater all these days has finally yielded some fruit! Go now, and if you should find some actor who knows aught of the beauty I seek, learn what you can and then meet me at the Shiokaze Hostelry.

dialogue.name: MEDIUMBUILDACTOR02812
dialogue.text: Were you in the audience tonight, friend? Forgive me, it has been a long night, and I find myself too tired for the usual evening merriment. I must take my leave of you and retire for the night.

dialogue.name: HANDSOMEACTOR02812
dialogue.text: Please, when I am off the stage, I am just another man of the city. Permit me my privacy. If you wish to see me, I urge you to purchase a ticket and attend a show. Good night to you.

dialogue.name: WABISABIACTOR02812
dialogue.text: You recognized me as an actor of the Mujikoza, did you? You've a sharper eye than I, then, my friend. I confess, yours is not a face I recall from any audience.

dialogue.name: WABISABIACTOR02812
dialogue.text: Hmmm... No, I know of no actress matching the description you've made. It sounds more as if your friend is speaking of some ravishing beauty he saw in a fever dream.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: A sweet smell emanates from the neck of the agile actor.

dialogue.name: WABISABIACTOR02812
dialogue.text: Aye, I'm sure of it. I know of no such actress among those in the employ of the Mujikoza. Your friend speaks of a fantasy, I'm sure of it.

dialogue.name: TRADER02812
dialogue.text: I found the actors I sought, but learned nothing of the one I truly seek. Tell me, what did you find, my friend?

dialogue.name: TRADER02812
dialogue.text: You smelled a sweet fragrance on one of the actors in the Ijin District!? It could very well be one of the cast who knows the woman I seek. Come, let us go and speak with him at length!

dialogue.name: WABISABIACTOR02812
dialogue.text: Ugh, I'd not thought this would all lead to you coming along. <sigh> Very well, I suppose I could give you the truth, then.

dialogue.name: TRADER02812
dialogue.text: Please, I must meet her. I simply must! This fragrance on you, it is hers. I know it to be! Tell me, what do you know of her. Tell me anything. Everything!

dialogue.name: WABISABIACTOR02812
dialogue.text: I can see you have no intention of leaving me be until I've answered. And so I will. But you may not find the truth so beautiful as your infatuation. For I am she.

dialogue.name: TRADER02812
dialogue.text: No... No, that simply cannot be. That is impossible. And yet... That voice. That neck. Those contours.

dialogue.name: WABISABIACTOR02812
dialogue.text: As a man grown you should know─every man knows far more of the female form than any woman. That is how I am able to portray the woman of every man's dreams. And so you know the truth. What, then, of your fantasies now? Shattered, are they?

dialogue.name: TRADER02812
dialogue.text: No... No, they are far from shattered. I feel stronger towards you now than ever! I regret that I must soon depart Kugane, but my business will bring me here again soon. And when it does, I will come and see you at every show!

dialogue.name: WABISABIACTOR02812
dialogue.text: Then on such evenings I will be sure I am at my most beautiful for you.

dialogue.name: TRADER02812
dialogue.text: This city is truly a marvel, is it not? The culture here is far more rich and complex than any other I've seen or known. I will be back, again and again, and again and again! Thank you, adventurer. You have given me a great gift this day.
